mobileApps.title: Your Finances in Your Pocket
mobileApps.description: Download our mobile apps and take control of your expenses anywhere, anytime.

features.title: Instant Expense Tracking
features.description: Snap receipts and log expenses on the go with just a few taps

features.title: Real-time Sync
features.description: Your data syncs instantly across all your devices

features.title: Offline Mode
features.description: Keep tracking expenses even without internet connection

features.title: Smart Budgeting
features.description: Set custom budgets for categories and get real-time feedback on your spending habits with intelligent alerts.

features.title: Insightful Analytics
features.description: Visualize your expenses and income with beautiful charts and actionable insights that help you make better decisions.

features.title: Secure & Private
features.description: Your data is encrypted and never shared. You are always in control of your privacy with bank-level security.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqSection.description: Everything you need to know about XpenseMate. Can't find the answer you're looking for? Reach out to our support team!

faqs.a: XpenseMate is a modern expense tracking and financial planning app that helps you manage your money, set budgets, and achieve your financial goals with ease.
Absolutely. Your data is encrypted and never shared. We use bank-level security to ensure your privacy and safety.

faqs.q: Can I use XpenseMate for free?
faqs.a: Yes! Our Free plan lets you track expenses and view limited statistics. Upgrade to unlock advanced features like AI chat, unlimited stats, and more.

faqs.q: What is the AI chat feature?
faqs.a: The AI chat lets you ask questions about your spending, get insights, and receive personalized financial advice based on your own data.

faqs.q: Can I cancel or change my plan anytime?
faqs.a: Yes, you can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings.
